description:
Gnostice XtremeDocumentStudio .NET is the next-generation multi-format document-processing component suite for .NET developers. Currently, it supports viewing, printing, and converting PDF, DOCX, DOC, BMP, JPEG, PNG, WMF, EMF, TIFF and MTIFF. More formats will be introduced in future. XtremeDocumentStudio includes multi-format document viewer controls for WinForms, WebForms, MVC, WPF, and HTML5. It can also convert document from one format to another, such as DOCX-to-PDF or PDF to images without requiring any other external software or libraries. It can also intelligently reconstruct page elements when converting PDF to DOCX. Some features such as programmatic document-creation, document-editing, and mail-merge have been introduced as a preview or beta.

XtremeDocumentStudio .NET is 100% managed code. It can natively process supported formats without requiring external software such as Microsoft Word, Open XML SDK, Word Automation Services, Adobe PDF library or GhostScript.
releaseNotes:
Version 2016 R3 - May 05, 2016
===================================
Enhanced
~~~~~~~~
+ HTML5 Document Viewer
  - Completely redesigned HTML5 Document Viewer control
    * Provides rich set of client side APIs
      + Introduced APIs for Quick Find operation
        - findFirst(), findNext(), findPrevious(), findLast()
      + All document level operations return JQueryPromise() object to get status info
      + Redesigned DocumentViewer initialization and “Preferences” class for ease of use
      + Redesigned event interface
        - Event registration through addEventListener() API on DocumentViewer object
        - Event de-registration through removeEventListener() API on DocumentViewer object
        - List of events supported
          * beforePageChange
            + afterPageChange 
            + beforeZoomChange
            + afterZoomChange 
            + beforeDocumentLoad
            + afterDocumentLoad 
            + beforeDocumentUpload
            + afterDocumentUpload
            + beforeDocumentPrint
            + afterDocumentPrint
            + beforeDocumentClose
            + onDocumentClose 
            + afterDocumentClose
            + beforePageRotate
            + afterPageRotate 
            + beforeDocumentDownload
            + afterDocumentDownload
            + beforeDocumentSave
            + afterDocumentSave 
    * Improved “Quick Find” experience
    * Redesigned toolbar UI for improved responsive behaviour
  - TypeScript support
    * TypeScript type definitions included
  - Interactive form filling
    * Fields supported
      + Text Field
        - Support for standard fields, combed fields, and password fields
      + Check Box
      + Radio Button
      + Push Button
        - Reset Action
          * Resets all fields
        - Submit Action
          * Supports HTTP GET and POST methods
      + Combo Box
      + List Box
    * Introduced APIs for submitting and resetting form fields
      + submitForm(submitUrl, submitMethod, includeFields): JQueryPromise
      + resetForm(fieldsToReset)
  - Introduced text search capability on scanned documents using OCR.
    * Properties to configure 
      + preferences.digitizerSettings.digitizationEnabled: boolean
      + preferences.digitizerSettings.textLanguage : string
  - Introduced “logger” class to enable logging of messages generated by DocumentViewer control on the browser console. 
    * Properties to configure 
      + logger.errorLogsEnabled: boolean
      + logger.infoLogsEnabled: boolean
+ WPF Document Viewer
  - Introduced Commands for MVVM pattern
    * DocumentLoadedCommand
    * PageChangedCommand
    * ZoomChangedCommand
    * NeedPasswordCommand
Fixed
~~~~~
+ Multi-format Document Converter
  - Converting Images to PDF throws “Value cannot be null” exception.
+ ASP.NET WebForms Document Viewer
  - Issues while loading files after calling closeDocument().
  - Issues while loading XPS files.
+ WPF Document Viewer
  - Navigation to specific page number through DocumentLoaded event.
+ Document Engines
  - Word formats
    * Issue while printing DOCX documents with CheckBox fields.
    * Application hangs with some documents having floating drawing objects.
  - PDF
    * Loading specific files with form fields throws “Null reference” exception.
    * Issues while handling opaque JBIG2 encoded images.
  - TIFF
    * Image with higher DPI were stretched and cropped.
+ General
  - Installation to GAC fails if user has only Visual Studio 2013 or Visual Studio 2015.
summary: View, print and convert PDF, DOCX, DOC, BMP, JPEG, PNG, WMF, EMF, and single-page and multi-page TIFF. Provides ASP .NET viewer, WinForms viewer, MVC viewer and WPF viewer components.
title: Gnostice XtremeDocumentStudio .NET Ultimate
